Posted By: JK
For sale is my T3 Turkey Red Eddie Collins w/advertisement back.  I guarantee it will grade at least a psa 1/sgc 10.  Though it will obviously receive a low technical grade due to several problems around the border, the picture itself remains visually very appealing. $300 shipped/insured.
